A new verification link has been sent to: I ye imɛli ladɛrɛsi min di i tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni senfɛ, sɛgɛsɛgɛli yɔrɔ kura dɔ cilen don.
Sɛgɛsɛgɛli jɛgɛnsira kura cilen don i ka imeyilɛri la.
A reset link will be sent if the account: Reset link bɛna ci ni jatebɔsɛbɛn bɛ yen.
Already have an account?: Aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn sɔrɔ kaban wa?
Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Yala i dalen b’a la ko i b’a fɛ k’i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔ yen wa?
Click here to re-send the verification e: Aw ye nin yɔrɔ digi walasa ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli imɛri ci kokura.
Delete your account and all of its resou: I ka jatebɔsɛbɛn ni a nafolo bɛɛ bɔ yen .
Each recovery code can be used once to a: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click Regenerate Codes above.
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Aw ye aw jija aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn ka baara kɛ ni kumasen jan ye, min tɛ kɛ cogo si la walasa ka to lakana la .
Enter the 6-digit code from your authent: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
Enter the authentication code provided b: Enter the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
Enter your details below to create your: Aw ye aw ka kunnafoni sɛbɛn jukɔrɔ walasa ka aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn dilan .
Enter your email and password below to l: I ka email ni i ka password sɛbɛn jukɔrɔ walasa ka don .
Enter your email to receive a password r: I ka e-mail sɛbɛn walasa ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn sɔrɔ min bɛ se ka kɛ i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn ye .
Forgot your password?: I ɲinɛna i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn kɔ wa?
Log in to your account: I ka don i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn kɔnɔ .
Manage your profile and account settings: I ka profile ani i ka jatebɔcogo ɲɛnabɔ .
Name: Tɔ̀gɔ
Once your account is deleted, all of its: Ni i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔra, a ka nafolo ni a ka kunnafoniw bɛɛ fana bɛna bɔ yen kudayi. Aw ye a sɛmɛntiya ko aw b’a fɛ ka aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔ yen kudayi.
Ni i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔra yen, a ka nafolo ni a ka kunnafoniw bɛɛ bɛna bɔ yen kudayi. I ka i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn sɛbɛn walasa k’a jira ko i b’a fɛ k’i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔ yen kudayi.
Please confirm access to your account by: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
Please enter your new password below: Aw ye aw ka kumasen kura sɛbɛn jukɔrɔ .
Please verify your email address by clic: Aw ye aw ka e-mail ladɛrɛsi sɛgɛsɛgɛ ni aw ye an ka email ci aw ma sisan.
Recovery codes let you regain access if: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
This is a secure area of the application: Nin ye yɔrɔ lakananen ye min bɛ sɔrɔ ɲinini na. Aw ye aw ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn dafa sani aw ka taa ɲɛ.
To finish enabling two-factor authentica: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
Two-factor authentication is now enabled: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
Update the appearance settings for your: Aw ye aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn yecogo kura ye cogo min na .
Update your account's appearance setting: Aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn ka ɲɛfɔli kɛcogo kura .
Update your name and email address: Aw ka tɔgɔ ni i ka imeyili ladɛrɛsi kura .
When you enable two-factor authenticatio: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
I ka imeyilɛri ladɛrɛsi ma sɛgɛsɛgɛ.
